E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1992
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Jose Uribe.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Thursday, 2/2/1992
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Glenn Wilson



Date: Sunday, 2/5/1992
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Detroit!

Regards,
Glenn Wilson



Date: Friday, 4/7/1992
Subject: Mark Petkovsek healing process
Mark Petkovsek is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Tom Goodwin
Dear Sir,
Tom Goodwin shouldn't play at AA Buffalo Bisons!
He has an AVG of .241 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Brook Fordyce
Dear Sir,
Brook Fordyce isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Buffalo Bisons!
He has an AVG of .136, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Darren Bragg
Dear Sir,
Darren Bragg has an AVG of .163 at AA Buffalo Bisons!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director
